title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.473 - External corrosion control: interference currents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.473 - External corrosion control: interference currents

State Regulations
(a) Each operator whose pipeline system is
subjected to stray currents shall have in effect a continuing program to
minimize the detrimental effects of such currents. (b) Each impressed current type cathodic
protection system or galvanic anode system must be designed and installed so as
to minimize any adverse effects on existing adjacent underground metallic
structures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.473

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
